attributes.review: i downloaded this to see what it’s about but then my phone had got a virus and i had to get it checked out and in the end i just got a new phone i do NOT recommend this app.
attributes.title: Gave me a virus🤦‍♀️

attributes.review: I was looking forward to using this app however it’s INCREDIBLY buggy and crashes whenever I open it. It also began to slow down my entire phone. I believe this app is extracting my personal information and is a national security threat to any American!
attributes.title: Buggy and Very Slow

attributes.review: Like why would u even want to know what he is up to 🙄
attributes.title: Just don’t get it...

attributes.review: As I downloaded this app I was eating my soup with a fork. As it downloaded I went to the bathroom and once I got back I IMMEDIATELY SAW THAT ALL OF MY NOODLES IN MY SOUP WERE GONE!!! I tried eating my soup with my fork again but...a last...I can’t. WARNING: THIS APP WILL STEAL YOUR SOUP NOODLES DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!🤬
attributes.title: 🤬🤬VERY UPSET

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the ghost of Eric Trump has been following me around ever since, which doesn’t make sense bc he’s still alive I think. Don’t recommend he’s not very good company and is always asking me where my mansion is very rude 0/5
attributes.title: This app is cursed

attributes.review: This app, much like the abomination that inspired it, is NOT user friendly and makes unwanted sexual advances. I therefore am unable to recommend it to any cognizant being in this or any other universe.
attributes.title: Trumpelstiltskin Tiny Terror

attributes.review: to all my fellow #trump2020 supporters, DO NOR get this app. it doesn’t provide accurate data and is full of lies that the liberal hackers want you to believe. such as black lives matter, trans lives matter and women are humans not objects 🤮🤮. 0/5 stars absolutely do not recommend 👎🏾👎🏾
attributes.title: this app is awful
